issue.title: Should I have both OGRE and OGRE2 installed?

content.raw:
1) The default ogre2 components listed look fine. Components such as rtshaders are not available in ogre2 and  terrain, and paging are not yet supported in ogre2.

2) The warning are ok and safe to ignore if you only want ogre2

3) ign-gui is using ign-rendering-ogre by default because ign-rendering-ogre2 was still under development. We may make the switch soon to use ogre2 after more testing. For now, you could modify [this line](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/9ba25931ca0651459381ec77b9c0386fa8857be8/CMakeLists.txt#lines-62) to search for `ogre2` instead of `ogre`

After making the change in 3), ign-gui should hopefully build for you
